customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Update notes:
Lindy Isherwood, October 21, 2020 09:49AM
  • Marked this test N/A for Rainforest as it's not possible to set up an email account on the VMs

inline.description:
Report a problem - RN
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Tap the three-dot menu in the top right of your screen
  2. Tap "Settings" ➜"Report a Problem"
  3. Confirm to compose the email in your email client
inline.expectedResult:
• A pre-filled email to "feedback@mattermost.com" should open.
  • You have the option to tap "Send" or type in additional information about the problem you have experienced.

customFields.Related ticket(s):
(Invalid) Settings -> Report a Problem: Configured email app (FastMail) opens but the To: field is empty — MM-27532
Determined to be a FastMail issue. Closed as Invalid.
customFields.Important notes about this step: ​​​​This test assumes you have a native email client set up on your device.
